content: click here for free pattern tutorial ** emotional support ghosts tutorial 1 ** boo we re crafting something ghostly perfect for halloween it s a super adorable emotional support ghost if you re a fan of amigurumi or just love all things cutesy and halloween-y this tutorial is perfect for you join us as we guide you through the steps to take to make this charming little emotional support ghost with our easy-to-follow instructions you ll have your own ghostie in no time and you know what s even better this is a very low sew pattern all parts of the ghost is crocheted straight on you only need to attach the hat on and glue on the card with your own supportive words whether you re a seasoned crocheter or just starting out you ll find this project both enjoyable and rewarding what you ll need * yarn in white * small amount of yarn in orange green and black or purple for the hat and any color you like for the bow * 7mm safety eyes or black yarn to sew the eyes * crochet hook * yarn needle * stitch marker * stuffing * tiny card for the emotional support phrases and words you can use any type of yarn for this project but for your ghost to be the same size as mine please use any type of yarn that will fit well on a size 5 3mm hook in this tutorial you ll learn * the materials you ll need to get started * crochet instructions with detailed visuals * tips on how else you can style you emotional support ghost ✨ why you ll love this tutorial * clear easy-to-follow instructions * high-quality close-up visuals to guide you through each step * a fun and rewarding project that makes a great gift or deco for halloween 1 https //youtu be/vweiv0romug
